Google News becomes bilingual: news from multiple nations in the same feed! (photo)
Update available immediately
04 Nov 2019, 19:32 by Enrico Paccusse
Google is the universal search engine, wherever we live in the world (except for some sporadic exceptions). The same goes for news, which is often filtered and selected directly in Google News.
The proprietary application that takes care of creating a feed based on the tastes of each user gains today a novelty that will please those who often find themselves reading articles in different languages.
With the new update there will in fact be the possibility of adding a language to the news stream, so as to enclose in a single list the whole world of news concerning our tastes, both in our mother tongue and in another of your choice.
At the moment the choice is unfortunately limited to one additional language. Below are some images we got from our terminals. To receive the news just update the application.
